sources.name: DVDSalesTransformation
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'long',
	preferredFractionalType: 'float') ~> DVDSalesTransformation

sinks.name: DataSink
sinks.script:
DVDSalesTransformation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DataSink
